title: No mystery chest following legendary skin purchase
body:
Bought to mystery skins today in the hopes of getting a snowball on the mystery chest.
Neither one procd a mystery chest at all. Has anyone else had that problem or has anyone actually got a chest from a legendary skin purchase?

replies.body: If you bought one between 12am today and 7pm today you can contact player support and they can solve the issue: Riot issue a offical post : [](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/YyYF83Kh-issues-with-legendary-snowball)
